column5: Whats driving company specific returns todayBUD TAP A US court has stopped Anheuser Busch InBev BUD from using portions of marketing that said competitor Molson Coors TAP MillerCoors used corn syrup when producing light beers Reuters reports In his ruling the judge said Anheuser Busch aimed to exploit confusion surrounding the use of corn syrup in beer production and that consumers would interpret advertising statements about made with corn syrup or brewed with corn syrup as corn syrup actually being in the final products
